--- title: "Orkunotkun á Íslandi" subtitle: "Hvernig skiptist orkunotkun í flokka á Íslandi?" author: - name: "Brynjólfur Gauti Guðrúnar Jónsson" url: "https://twitter.com/bgautijonsson" affiliation: "Tölfræði, Raunvísindadeild Háskóla Íslands" affiliation-url: "https://www.hi.is/tolfraedi_0" date: "2022/07/15" format: html: code-fold: true toc: true toc-depth: 2 toc-location: right toc-title: Efnisyfirlit page-layout: full max-width: "1000px" execute: echo: true warning: false cache: true editor: source theme: flatly title-block-banner: true standalone: true self-contained: true categories: - orkumál - R - íslenska --- # Gögn Hér nota ég [gögn frá Our World in Data](https://github.com/owid/energy-data) sem taka saman upplýsingar um alls kyns orkunotkun, orkuframleiðslu og útblæstri, ásamt fólksfjölda og landsframleiðslu. ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_e6fc9d8f2c3c24c4be5d3fd19d706be3'} ```{.r .cell-code} url <- "https://px.hagstofa.is:443/pxis/api/v1/is/Umhverfi/4_orkumal/2_framleidslaognotkun/IDN02105.px" px_vars <- pxweb_get(url) query_list <- list( "Ár" = c("*"), "Notkun" = c("*") ) d <- pxweb_get(url, query = pxweb_query(query_list), verbose = FALSE) |> as.data.frame() |> as_tibble() |> janitor::clean_names() |> rename(magn = 3) |> filter(notkun != "Samtals") |> mutate(ar = parse_number(ar), magn = coalesce(magn, 0), notkun = fct_other(notkun, drop = c("Annar iðnaður", "Orkuvinnsla", "Önnur notkun", "Siglingar innanlands"), other_level = "Annað")) |> count(ar, notkun, wt = magn, name = "oliunotkun") |> group_by(ar) |> mutate(p = oliunotkun / sum(oliunotkun, na.rm = T)) |> ungroup() ``` ::: # Olíunotkun (1982 - 2020) :::{.panel-tabset} ## Magn ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621' hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_5c795764f4d02b5bb4008ebd7f801517'} ```{.r .cell-code} p <- d |> mutate(notkun = fct_reorder(notkun, oliunotkun * (notkun != "Annað"), .fun = mean), text = str_c("Notkun: ", notkun, "\n", "Magn: ", number(oliunotkun, big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ","))) |> ggplot(aes(ar, oliunotkun, text = text)) + geom_col(aes(fill = notkun, group = notkun, col = notkun), position = "stack", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(), breaks = c(1982, 1990, 2000, 2010, 2020)) + scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(), labels = label_number(big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ",")) + scale_colour_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Set1") + scale_fill_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Set1") + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none", plot.margin = margin(t = 5, r = 15, b = 5, l = 5)) + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Olíunotkun á Íslandi (1982 - 2020)") ggplotly(p, tooltip = "text") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Hlutföll ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621' hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_e5f5823eb9bc25f5912cebab1d97a566'} ```{.r .cell-code} p <- d |> mutate(notkun = fct_reorder(notkun, p * (notkun != "Annað"), .fun = mean), text = str_c("Notkun: ", notkun, "\n", "Hlutfall: ", percent(p, accuracy = 1))) |> ggplot(aes(ar, p, text = text)) + geom_col(aes(fill = notkun, group = notkun, col = notkun), position = "fill", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(), breaks = c(1982, 1990, 2000, 2010, 2020)) + scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(), labels = label_percent()) + scale_colour_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Set1") + scale_fill_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Set1") + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none", plot.margin = margin(t = 5, r = 15, b = 5, l = 5)) + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Olíunotkun á Íslandi (1982 - 2020)") ggplotly(p, tooltip = "text") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: :::
